content.question: Which of the following ground-state electron configurations represents the atom that has the lowest first-ionization energy?

choices.label: <math alttext="1 s 2, 2 s 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mn>1</mn><mi>s</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><msup><mrow><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mn>2</mn><mi>s</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="1 s 2, 2 s 2, 2 p 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mn>1</mn><mi>s</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><msup><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>s</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><msup><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="1 s 2, 2 s 2, 2 p 6, 3 s 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mn>1</mn><mi>s</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><msup><mrow><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mn>2</mn><mi>s</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><msup><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></msup><msup><mrow><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mn>3</mn><mi>s</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 1.A: Describe the components of and quantitative information from models and representations that illustrate particulate-level properties only.
